amendment.description: Amendment requires any purchaser of a pre-FIRM primary residential home to pay phased-in actuarial flood insurance prices using the same phase-in structure that non-residential and non-primary homes are currently subject to in the legislation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-530 to require any purchaser of a pre-firm primary residential home to pay phased-in actuarial flood insurance prices using the same phase-in structure that non-residential and non-primary homes are currently subject to in the legislation, after the enactment of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
